awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 7 wins & 7 nominations.

fullplot: Morgan Delt is a failed and irresponsible left-wing artist whose Communist parents own a fish and chips shop in downmarket London. He is also an aggressive and self-admitted dreamer, a fantasist who uses his flights of fancy as refuge from external reality, where his unconventional behavior lands him in a divorce from his wife, Leonie, trouble with the police and, ultimately, incarceration in a lunatic asylum.
plot: After his wife leaves him for another man, a London artist begins his descent into madness in trying to win her back.
title: Morgan!
